ygData.subject: Re: Twinking (Was Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort  of))
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Going even farther afield, I killed a Darkweed snake with an orc pawn scalp as loot.  My immediate comment to the zone Hey, this snake had a orc pawn
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
>> Yup it works quite well, be a bit careful with weapons as
>> humanoid types (orcs, skeletons, etc) will wield those
>> weapons as well. Of course it would be kinda funny to see
>> a skeleton with a BIBS :)
>
>I was thinking more along the lines of a lucky fire beetle with a
>lightstone, or maybe a bat with a nice gem in their belly or something. A
>snake with a rusty sword or spear would be kind of odd I think.. :)
>


Going even farther afield, I killed a Darkweed snake with an
orc pawn scalp as loot. My immediate comment to the zone
"Hey, this snake had a orc pawn scalp on it! Do you suppose
he ate a pawn?"

Got at least 5 laughs out of that one :)
